name: socialflows
description: Automated cross-posting for a fractured web
author: Ric Wood <ric@grislyeye.com>

scripts.start: actionsflow start -- -s TWITTER_CONSUMER_API_KEY -s TWITTER_CONSUMER_API_SECRET -s TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN -s TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET -s BLUESKY_PASSWORD
scripts.watch: actionsflow start -w -- -s TWITTER_CONSUMER_API_KEY -s TWITTER_CONSUMER_API_SECRET -s TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN -s TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET -s BLUESKY_PASSWORD
